short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click to add a <pre> tag inside the HTML <body>.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open source, of course:
https://github.com/ryanpcmcquen/clickForCode

Useful for when you have a PHP `var_dump();` and forgot to add a `<pre>` tag.

It also automatically detects text only pages, and will automatically format them.
